mapper.select: select id from member where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pw, name, birthday, nickname, gender, point, tel, postcode, addr, addr2) values (#{id},#{pw},#{name},#{birthday},#{nickname},#{gender},0,null,0,null,null)
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, birthday=#{birthday}, nickname=#{nickname}, gender=#{gender}, tel=#{tel} where id=#{id}
